00467                 inline const bool _isRenderQueueInList(const std::vector<Ogre::RenderQueueGroupID>& l, const Ogre::RenderQueueGroupID& rq)
00468                 {
00469                         for (std::vector<Ogre::RenderQueueGroupID>::const_iterator i = l.begin(); i != l.end(); i++)
00470                         {
00471                                 if ((*i) == rq)
00472                                 {
00473                                         return true;
00474                                 }
00475                         }
00476 
00477                         return false;
00478                 }
